GVP of Marketing at ClickUp
 
Hey, Hagop!

Your team knows that AI is crucial for increasing productivity. However, you also know that more disconnected tools leads to chaos instead of clarity.

Sound familiar? You're not alone. Most organizations are struggling with "AI sprawl"—where multiple AI tools work in isolation, creating inefficiencies instead of solutions.

chunks.text:
Your team knows that AI is crucial for increasing productivity. However, you also know that more disconnected tools leads to chaos instead of clarity.

Sound familiar? You're not alone. Most organizations are struggling with "AI sprawl"—where multiple AI tools work in isolation, creating inefficiencies instead of solutions.

Join us for a virtual event that reveals how to transform AI chaos into your competitive advantage:
 
Contextual AI: Why It Matters for the Future of Work
Date: Tuesday, June 17
Time: 12:00 PM PST / 3:00 PM EST
Secure your spot now <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/IBLlCP5BDUJO6WpIBCzhxiyKS?domain=links.clickup.com> 	 
 
What you'll discover:
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/c94a16d4-8be2-c12f-0cd2-89583c825244.png> 	
The hidden costs of disconnected AI tools on productivity and security.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/a6299517-3b82-40e6-8feb-ccaab30e8b20.png> 	
Why context matters—how Contextual AI delivers exponentially better results.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/0a090ad1-e8b9-b13d-6b6f-b46b7cebcb48.png> 	
Live demonstrations of ClickUp's AI Answers Agent, Project Manager, and Knowledge Agent.
 <https://mcusercontent.com/58cc6fdf204aea6e7442682a9/images/3791461f-a53d-1a80-40f4-eb275f577839.png> 	
The transformation roadmap from AI chaos to contextual clarity.
 
Exclusive for attendees:
